description: The versatile Renegade™ Cargo Men’s Short is cut from KÜHL’s innovative Duralux™ fabric. This strong, yet breathable, material delivers quick-drying, anti-abrasion, and stretch properties that take these shorts to the next level. Premium sun protection (UPF 50) and nine pockets offer secure storage.
name: Kuhl Renegade Cargo Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
